findTerm

public boolean findTerm(java.lang.String _term)
Performs a binary search in the term position file in order to locate the given term. If the term is located, currentTerm and Postings contain the correct data

Parameters:
_term - The term to search for.
Returns:
true if the term is found, and false otherwise.
